actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to take away the power of the Committee on Rules to report rules or orders waiving the germaneness requirement.

summary.text: Amends rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the Committee on Rules from reporting any rule or order waiving the prohibition against considering nongermane amendments.

titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to take away the power of the Committee on Rules to report rules or orders waiving the germaneness requirement.
